setOrientation(int).Description: Sets the orientation for this divider. This should be called if @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#LayoutManager_E@ changes orientation.

Parameters: Drawable: Drawable that should be used as a divider.

ClassDesc: DividerItemDecoration is a @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#ItemDecoration_E@ that can be used as a divider between items of a @B_android#support#v7#widget#LinearLayoutManager_E@. It supports both @B_android#support#v7#widget#DividerItemDecoration#HORIZONTAL_E@ and @B_android#support#v7#widget#DividerItemDecoration#VERTICAL_E@ orientations.
